data.text: Ngʼat ma ok jahera dwaro mana gige
Ngʼat mofuwo ok mor kod winjo wach
Ka richo biro, e kaka achaya biro,
Weche mag dho ngʼato tut ka nam,
Ok en gima ber chwako ngʼat ma timbene richo
Lew ngʼat mofuwo kelone dhawo,
Dho ngʼat mofuwo ema tieke,
Weche mag kuoth chalo gi chiemo mamit;
Ngʼat ma jasamuoyo e tich
Nying Jehova Nyasaye en ohinga maratego,
Mwandu mar jomoko e ohinga mochiel motegno ma gigengʼorego,
Kapok ngʼato opodho, to sunga bedo e chunye,
Chik iti kapok idwoko wach;
Chuny ngʼato sire e tuo,
Chuny ma weche donjone yudo ngʼeyo;
Chiwo yawo yo ne ngʼat machiwo
Ngʼat mokwongo keto wachne nenore ni en kare,
Goyo ombulu tieko larruok
Kiketho ne owadu to duoge iri tek
Wach mawuok e dho ngʼato ema miyo ngʼato yiengʼ;
Lep nigi teko mar ngima kod tho,
Ngʼatno moyudo dhako onwangʼo gima ber
Ngʼat ma jachan ywak kokwayo ngʼwono,
Ngʼat man-gi osiepe mangʼeny nyalo chopo e kethruok
